Draw 5 project cards. Draft. Pick one ca: Trekk 5 prosjekt kort. Draft. Velg et kort og gi resten videre til neste spilller. Gjenta til du har 5 kort.
Draw 5 more project cards. Draft and pas: Trekk 5 flere prosjekt kort. Draft og gi resten av kortene til forrige spiller i stede.
Draft the prelude cards. Pick one card a: Draft prelude(foranledning) kortene. Velg et kort og gi resten videre til neste spiller. Gjenta til du har 4 prelude(foranledning) kort.
Select which corporation, 2 preludes and: Velg firma, 2 prelude(foranledning) kort og prosjekt kort å beholde
In turn order, play the corporation and: Etter tur, spil firma kort og betal 3 M€ for hvert prosjektkort beholdt.
Etter tur, spill begge preludes (foranledning) kortene.
(Optional variant: draft the cards. Pick: (Valgfri variant: Draft kortene, Velg et kort og gi resten videre. Gjenta til du har valgt 4 kort slik.)
Decide how many cards to buy: Bestem hvor mange kort du vil beholde
Take 1 or 2 actions (mandatory 2 actions: Utfør 1 eller 2 Actions (2 hvis hurtig modus er på)
use active card action: Aktiver et blått kort sin Action
send delegate: free from lobby, 5 M€ fro: Send delegat: Fri fra lobby, 5 M€ fra reservan. (UTVIDELSER IKKE OVERSATT)
If temperature, oxygen, and oceans are m: Hvis tempratur, oksygen og hav er max, hopp over resten av sol fasen og gå til avslutt spill fase.
• Prelude: The game ends 2 generations e: • Prelude: The game ends 2 generations earlier.
• Venus Next: The Venus track must be co: • Venus Next: The Venus track must be completed for solo mode victory.
• The Moon (Terraforming condition): The: • The Moon (Terraforming condition): The game ends 2 generations later. The Moon must tracks must be completed for solo mode victory.
ii. World Government Terraforming (start: ii. World Government Terraforming (start player chooses)
Each colony tile track is increased 1 st: Each colony tile track is increased 1 step if possible
1. TR Revision: All players lose 1 TR: 1. TR Revision: All players lose 1 TR
2. Global Event: Perform the current Glo: 2. Global Event: Perform the current Global Event
Rerform the ruling bonus of the dominant: Rerform the ruling bonus of the dominant party
The dominant party leader becomes chairm: The dominant party leader becomes chairman, earning 1 TR.
Move the old chairman and all other dele: Move the old chairman and all other delegates from the dominant party to the reserves.
Shift the dominance marker. In case of t: Shift the dominance marker. In case of tie, the party closest to the left of the previous dominant party becomes dominant.
Move the coming (middle) Global Event to: Move the coming (middle) Global Event to current position (right). Add its lower neutral delegate.
Move the distant (left) Global Event to: Move the distant (left) Global Event to coming position (middle)
Reveal a new Global Event in the distant: Reveal a new Global Event in the distant (left) position. Add its top neutral delegate
In turn order, convert plants to greener: I rekkefølge, konverter Planter til Drivhus
Score: TR + tiles + card + milestones +: Score: TR + Brikker + Kort + Milepæler + Konkuranse belønninger + (1 VP per styreleder og parti leder)
